manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Step 1 | Cleanse Multipurpose, sulfate-free wash eliminates dirt and sweat without drying. Step 2 | Deodorize Glides on easily for long-lasting odor and wetness protection. Step 3 | Moisturize Quick-penetrating lotion nourishes skin as it cools, soothes, and hydrates. Next page The Jack Black Out-the-Door Morning Routine: 3 Steps 1 Cleanse 2 Deodorize 3 Moisturize

Our Company Who We Are Founded in 2000, based in Texas, Jack Black was an early pioneer in the luxury men's skincare market. Today Jack Black has grown to become the #1 best-selling men's skincare brand* *Source: The NPD Group Inc/US Prestige Beauty Total Measured Market, Skincare Retail Dollar Sales, Jan 2017-Dec 2017

Previous page Look your best Face No matter your skin type, Jack Black offers superior skincare for all needs. It’s not about the razor Shave Shave & style your facial hair with ease. What makes this product cooling to the skin? This product contains a gentle derivative of menthol that provides a refreshing, cooling sensation to the skin. When should I use it? The lightweight, penetrating formula is perfect for application after showers, playing sports, or working out. Will it leave my skin feeling greasy? No, this product is formulated to be lightweight and quick-penetrating. Is it fragranced? No. A mild, natural scent leaves skin smelling subtly clean and fresh. Legal Disclaimers (Safe for all skin types)Dermatologist Tested (Ref.No:RIPT.JO724-B6.ODERM.50.JBC), Sulfate-Free/Fragrance-Free: Natural Efficacy (Provital Group id: 41760).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A great lotion! I really like how thin and light the lotion feels when applied and it has a very fresh smell. Use this lotion everyday and will be purchasing more in the future

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells great and the cooling element is nice. I use this after showers and it really helps keep my skin moist. Little pricey but you get a lot of product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good moisturizing lotion
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loves this lotion, it really helps his dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars relaxing, masculine scent, soft skin
reviews.reviewText: helped soften my skin, and since i don't use body shampoo since it dries me out badly. this natural moisturizer replaced that routine. I like the scent it has it lingers for hours after 3-4 usually for me I enjoy it. I noticed my skin getting softer an glows more healthy. its a great product worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All the reviews are correct. Great!
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to purchase a really nice moisturizer for myself as a man and wanted something beyond the usual suspects. I saw this and thought, is this really good and second isa ti worth the price. The reality is yes to both.The smell is not overwhelming at all, but is very pleasant and very masculine (but it is not also a musk smell). The lotion itself feels really great and is not oily. The lotion appears to be very high quality. After a few times using this I can already notice my skin becoming softer, so it appears to work well.Great product! Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For my husband
reviews.reviewText: He never wears scents or cologne but I found this lotion and he uses it all the time now - it really helps his dry skin and it smells amazing, very soft and subtle - will keep buying it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Man Moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for about two years and am on my second bottle. Great scent, non-greasy. Although I had no issues with the pump when used normally, I see the new pump is beefier overall and the pickup tube is bigger for the pump hammerers. Great product. I'm sure you can find something cheaper, but for the quality and scent, I pay the toll.The scent smells kind of like aftershave, but the good kind us young hot guys buy, not the old man smell like Old Spice. You can smell it when you put your nose on your arm/face, but it's not overpowering once dry so it doesn't mess with cologne or body spray you may have on.Between this and SitFresh you will irresistible unless doomed from birth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was told it “smells better than it tastes” but that was just us. Other than that she said she loves it on me!! Just didn’t like the taste of it in her mouth.

reviews.reviewTitle: Mikroplastik: Jeder von uns isst eine Kreditkarte pro Woche ...
reviews.reviewText: War mein erster und letzter Versuch mit Jack Black Bodylotions, aus folgenden Gründen:1: Wir nehmen schon jetzt 5 Gramm Plastik jede Woche über die Nahrung auf, sollte uns allen schön langsam ein wenig zu denken anregen!Hier ist natürlich auch Mikroplastik enthalten (Vielen Dank an Codecheck, tolle Arbeit, super APP), wie in 99 % der hier angebotenen Lotionen, hier wäre Amazon in der Pflicht, gegenzusteuern!HOW DARE YOU !Hautgefühl ist Super, Lotion zieht schnell ein, kein Kleben, passt!Mein subjektives Geruchsempfinden: hat mir sehr gefallen, passt!Inhaltsstoffe: Siehe oben, bzw. geht wesentlich besser, Naja...... (nutzt die Codecheck APP)

reviews.reviewTitle: Las cremas de hombre no deben oler
reviews.reviewText: Como siempre buenos productos JB pero esta crema si huele , cosa que no me agrada. Tamaño familiar
No queda el olor por mucho tiempo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 3, 2019
